name: Sunday Job
description:
Submission for weekly Game Jam #144 

Theme: In the Dark 

You're a dad who has left some DIY electrical repairs too late,  to avoid leaving your family in dark, you must spend the night keeping the lights on.

If a lamp goes out it will spawn monsters in the darkness, who will attack, your family, other lights, or you.  You all must make it through the night.

Your head torch is intense enough to hurt and kill enemies when they are in range., but be careful it has bad batteries.

Made by Esewi Egheosa
